argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_funrel | |- ( Fun F -> Rel F ) |
| 2 |  | #P_releldm | |- ( ( Rel F /\ A F B ) -> A e. dom F ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ex | |- ( Rel F -> ( A F B -> A e. dom F ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( Fun F -> ( A F B -> A e. dom F ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_pm4.71rd | |- ( Fun F -> ( A F B <-> ( A e. dom F /\ A F B ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_funbrfvb | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( ( F ` A ) = B <-> A F B ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_pm5.32da | |- ( Fun F -> ( ( A e. dom F /\ ( F ` A ) = B ) <-> ( A e. dom F /\ A F B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( Fun F -> ( A F B <-> ( A e. dom F /\ ( F ` A ) = B ) ) ) |
